item.title: Start Again in 2026
item.description: A blog reboot… been a lot going on and I figure a reset is in order. I look forward to posting regularly, on what cadence I have not decided yet. I hope to provide interesting content. This will likely be very tech centric generally. If a post isn’t I will tag it in some way Thanks for coming by!

item.title: About
item.description: Ray’s experience ranges from seed funded startup to the Fortune 50 inside telecoms, ISP’s, financials, media and security companies. Ray is a technical problem solver, and solutions oriented builder. He is known for on-time, on-spec delivery with a reputation of getting things done. Ray’s background includes experience from all vantage points of the software and product lifecycle delivering some 30+ products with both internal and external customers so far. Ray has worked in software and product development, systems programming, technical operations, automation, virtualization and containerization in many environments including public cloud, hybrid, and on-prem.
